name: The Other In Me
description:
What's this about?:

        The Other In Me is a 2D Local Multiplayer game where each player has a different role. You two must defend a village from monsters.

         One player will become a dreadful wraith, whose job will be to slay your enemies as they approach, while the other player is a human that will deploy barriers in order to stop the monster from advancing. Passed a minute both players will exchange roles.

Nice hunting!

CREATIVE STATEMENT:

          Our goal is to make players realize that even if they have different abilities and objectives, they can collaborate to achieve a common end, making them not waker, but stronger together.
